item.title: Betting on the NBA is a roller coaster ride
item.description: Our group, The Road to Luxury consisting of Samuel Metcalfe, Ethan Peterson, Collin Hansen and myself made the decision that in the NBA, offense is more important than defense. Now this may not be a hot take, however it does not need to be. We built our model around teamsâ€™ abilities to outscore their opponents, using things like point differential and net ratings, which are dictated by HOW MUCH teams outscore their opponents.
